SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwCOAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Underling		    0 CompanyReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30
; 1 = Clerk	    5 CompanyReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Steward	  10 CompanyReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Fixer	  20 CompanyReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Agent		  30 CompanyReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Negotiator	  45 CompanyReputation,	Strength 31, Endurance 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Officer		  60 CompanyReputation,	Strength 32, Endurance 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Deputy	  90 CompanyReputation,	Strength 33, Endurance 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Factor		110 CompanyReputation,	Strength 34, Endurance 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30

; Company = Speechcraft, Mercantile, Security, Blade, LightArmor

SHORT CompanyAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT CompanyReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

SHORT colonystate
short colonyService



BEGIN GameMode
	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF CompanyAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 91
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET CompanyAdvancement TO 0
		RETURN
	ENDIF ; CompanyAdvancement == 4

	IF CompanyAdvancement == 3 || CompanyAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 0
		IF CompanyReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 10 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Security >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 10
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 1
		IF CompanyReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 20 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Security >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 20
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 2
		IF CompanyReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 30 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Security >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 30
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 3
		IF CompanyReputation >= 40
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 40 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Security >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 40
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 4
		IF CompanyReputation >= 50
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 31 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 50 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Security >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 50
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 5
		IF CompanyReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 32 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 60 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Security >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 60
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 6
		IF CompanyReputation >= 70
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 33 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 70 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Security >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 70
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0EastSEmpireSCompany == 7
		IF CompanyReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 35 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 90 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Security >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwCOAdvancement 80
			SET CompanyAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF



	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET CompanyAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET CompanyAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET CompanyAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
